short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify your property hunt! Get one-click route & commute insights directly from any listing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for a smarter way to hunt for your dream property on Rightmove? Introducing "Rightmove - Get Directions", an ingenious tool that brings the power of Google's transit directions right into your property search!

Say goodbye to constant tab-switching and manual address inputs. Now, right next to every property's address on Rightmove, you'll find a helpful "Get Directions" link. Clicking this link whisks you away to Google's transit page, automatically loaded with the property's location. 

This magic trick lets you explore commute times, different routes, and distances from each potential property to your chosen destination, in your preferred mode of travel, without ever leaving Rightmove's site. This way, you can factor in your daily commute and plan your day more efficiently right from the get-go.

Setting up is a breeze! Click on our extension, type in your regular destination and your preferred travel mode - driving, walking, biking, or public transport. Voila, you're all set! Remember to give your open Rightmove pages a quick refresh, and you'll find the "Get Directions" link sitting pretty by every address.

Make "Rightmove - Get Directions" your personal assistant in your property search journey today, because the perfect home isn't just about the right building, it's also about the right location. Happy house-hunting!

This extension is completely offline and does not collect any data from browser.
